issueTypes.label: Agent Connectivity Issue
issueTypes.description: Cannot connect to support agent or communication system

network: Check if WiFi icon is visible in your system tray and connected
Disable and re-enable your WiFi adapter (Device Manager ‚Üí Network Adapters)
Forget the WiFi network and reconnect with your password
Run Windows Network Diagnostics (right-click WiFi icon ‚Üí Troubleshoot problems)
Restart your router or access point (unplug for 30 seconds)
broadband: Test your speed at fast.com or speedtest.net and note the result
Restart your router (unplug power for 30 seconds, then plug back in)
Check if other devices on the same network have the same issue
Inspect all cable connections (from wall socket to router)
Check your ISP's website or call them to check for service outages in your area
